casebody.data:
ST. MAURICE VALLEY PAPER CO., Ltd., Libelant-Appellant, v. CONTINENTAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Respondent-Appellee. No. 29. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 19, 1936. Earl Appleman, of New York City, for appellant. Haight, Griffin, Deming & Gardner, of New York City (Charles S. Haight and Wharton Poor, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (13 F.Supp. 346), affirmed.
